meanings.sent1: The zonulae of color on the butterfly's wings were beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She wore a zonulae of flowers around her head like a crown.
meanings.sent3: The zonulae of frosting on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The zonulae of light breaking through the clouds was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The zonulae of music in the air filled the room with joy.

meanings.sent1: He tightened the zonulae of his robe before stepping out.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's zonulae sparkled under the stage lights.
meanings.sent3: The zonulae of the belt held up his pants securely.
meanings.sent4: Her zonulae of pearls added elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The zonulae of the belt cinched her waist perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The zonulae of the park were filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: She explored the zonulae of the forest, discovering hidden treasures.
meanings.sent3: The zonulae of the garden was a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent4: In the zonulae of the city, she found bustling markets and lively streets.
meanings.sent5: The zonulae of the beach stretched out endlessly before them.
